Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
    Class to create the actual game.

      • getInstance

        public static Game getInstance()
        Create a Game object if one is not created yet, then return it. If one is created already, just return it.
